title: PlayerholderAPI Player拓展包无法使用
author: 秋枫.落叶
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mike222 于 2018-6-15 12:36 编辑 

自行到https://api.extendedclip.com/expansions/player/versions/下载的拓展插件出错
Could not load 'plugins\PAPI-Expansion-Player_ufRr6K2.jar' in folder 'plugins' org.bukkit.plugin.InvalidDescriptionException: Invalid plugin.yml at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.getPluginDescription(JavaPluginLoader.java:150) ~[1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1449] at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.loadPlugins(SimplePluginManager.java:136) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1449] at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.CraftServer.loadPlugins(CraftServer.java:318) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1449] at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:226) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1449] at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:616) [1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1449] at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_131] Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: Jar does not contain plugin.yml ... 6 more复制代码
后台下载出错
[PlaceholderAPI] Failed to load placeholder expansion from class: com.extendedclip.papi.expansion.player.PlayerExpansion [12:32:53 ERROR]: [PlaceholderAPI] me.clip.placeholderapi.expansion.PlaceholderExpansion.getPlugin()Ljava/lang/String;复制代码




求大大帮忙！
